Interface Summary

BillingManager  
Purchasable  
PurchaseObserver An interface for observing changes related to purchases.
 

Class Summary
BillingContext  
BillingManagerImpl  
BillingReceiver This class implements the broadcast receiver for in-app billing.
BillingResponseHandler This class contains the methods that handle responses from the Google Play app.
BillingService This class sends messages to the Google Play app on behalf of the application by connecting (binding) to the MarketBillingService.
MockBillingManager  
PurchaseOnClickListener  
PurchaseOrder A class to hold the verified purchase order information.

Enum Summary
